ol.title: To remove an attachment from unsent mail:
ol.li: While viewing a message, click Add/Edit.

In the Attached File table, click Remove for the attachment you want to remove. The attachment is removed from your email message.
Note: If you have selected to save a copy of this message in the Sent Items Folder, be aware that any remaining attachments also are saved and that they affect your account disk space.

ol.title: To remove all attachments from unsent mail:
ol.li: In the email message, next to Attachments, select Add/Edit.
In the Attached File table, click Remove All. All attachments are removed from your email message.
